sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">

v-app(:style="{backgroundColor: '#333333'}")
  transition(name="page" mode="out-in")
    router-view(:key='$route.path')
  #myMenu(@click.stop='drawer = !drawer')
    .menuBack(:style="{'background-color':color.but}")
      .menuBox
        .menuBar1
        .menuBar2
        .menuBar3
  v-navigation-drawer(v-model='drawer' absolute='' bottom='' temporary='' :style='{backgroundColor: color.but}')
    v-list(nav='' dense='')
      v-list-item-group(v-model='group' active-class='white--text text--accent-4')
        v-list-item(v-for='item in menuItems' :key='item.title')
          v-list-item-title
            router-link(:to='item.link' :style="{color: '#FFF'}") {{item.title}}
  .home
    router-link(to='/' :style="{color: '#FFF'}") HOME
</template>

<script>

import HelloWorld from './components/HelloWorld';

export default {
  name: 'App',
  components: {
    HelloWorld,
  },
  data: () => ({
    drawer: false,
    group: null,
    menuItems: [
      {title: "加班申請",link: '/OTsubmmit'},
      {title: "休假申請",link: '/leave/Picker'},
      {title: "打卡紀錄",link: '/recording'},
      {title: "補休累計時數",link: '/compensatoryTime'},
      {title: "職務代理人設定",link: '/agent'}
    ],
            color: {
            bgc: "#333333",
            but: "#A78E70"
            }
  }),
  watch: {
      group () {
        this.drawer = false
      },
    },
};

</script>

<style lang="sass">
#app
  font-family: 'Microsoft JhengHei', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif

html
  text-align: center
  color: #eee
h1, p
  color: #FFF
h1
  padding-top: 100px

#myMenu
  position: absolute
  left: 0
  top: 0
  width: 500px
  height: 100vh

.menuBack
  width: 50px
  position: relative
  top: 5%
  left: 5%
  transition: 0.3s

.menuBox
  left: 5%
  top: 5%
  width: 50px
  padding: 8px
  transition: 0.6s
  cursor: pointer
  &:hover
    box-shadow: 2px 2px 2px rgba(51, 51, 102, 0.6), 4px 4px 6px rgba(51, 51, 102, 0.4), 6px 6px 12px rgba(51, 51, 102, 0.4)

.menuBar1, .menuBar2, .menuBar3
  width: 35px
  height: 5px
  background-color: white
  transition: 0.3s
  margin: 6px 0

.menuList
  margin-top: 60px

.home
  height: 40px
  width: 100px
  line-height: 30px
  padding: 5px
  border: 1px solid white
  position: absolute
  right: 10%
  bottom: 10%
  transition: 0.6s
  cursor: pointer
  &:hover
    background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3)

a
  display: block
  text-decoration: none
  font-size: 120%

.page-enter-active, .page-leave-active
  transition: 0.6s

.page-enter, .page-leave-to
  opacity: 0


</style>
